name: SupplierCreateOrUpdatePurchaseOrder
description:
Creates a purchase order (or updates it if it already exists).

When the order already exists, only the lines can be updated (see `SupplierUpdatePurchaseOrder`) - other properties will be ignored.

:lightbulb: Using `SupplierCreateOrder` and `SupplierUpdatePurchaseOrder` is preferred.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifer of the order from the 3rd party

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: Identifier of the 3rd party system that created the order

properties.name: ExpectedDeliveryDate
properties.description: Date that the supplier expects to deliver the shipment(s) of the purchase order

properties.name: Receive
properties.description: Receive the order immediately after shipping, works only if `Ship` is set to true

properties.name: Ship
properties.description: Ship the order immediately after creation

properties.name: ShipFromOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: OrganizationUnit who will be supplying the stock.

properties.name: ShipToOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: OrganizationUnit that will be receiving the purchase order shipment(s).
